document_data.name: ''Spellthief''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Spellthief''''' was a type of [[enchanted]] [[longbow]] beneficial for those individuals who were proficient with both ranged weapons and [[magic]].
document_data.Description: When a creature touched the ''Spellthief'', they felt a gentle shiver of magical energy flowing from the weapon into the wielder's hand, like a promise of recovering expended magics.
document_data.Powers: The enchantments placed on the ''Spellthief'' allowed its wielder to recover expended simple magics when landing an especially successful shot. This ability needed time to recharge and could only be activated after the wielder rested for at least one hour.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the ''Spellthief'' belonged to a [[green hag]] from the [[Western Heartlands]] who masqueraded as a kindly old herbalist named [[Auntie Ethel]].
